experience.description: I am passionate about software development, with over 2 years of experience in complete projects and a focus on creating innovative solutions.

passionateAbout.description: Passionate about turning ideas into innovative solutions that make a difference.
passionateAbout.alwaysReady: I am ready to take your projects to the next level!

shortly.title: Shortly - URL Shortener
shortly.description: Web application for shortening URLs. It provides an administration panel, authentication, visit tracking, and a responsive design for an optimal experience on various devices.

facturation.title: Invoicing System
facturation.description: Invoice, customer, and product management system. It provides an administration panel, authentication, report generation, and a responsive design.

tickets.title: Ticket System
tickets.description: A robust system for managing tickets, users, and roles. It offers an administration panel, user authentication, ticket assignment functionalities, real-time chat to enhance communication and problem resolution, and a responsive design for seamless use on a variety of devices.

contact.interestedInWorking: If you're interested in working with me, feel free to contact me.
contact.alwaysReady: I'm always ready to collaborate on new challenges.

bio.name: I am a software developer with over 2 years of experience in Full Stack development, working both on the frontend and backend with technologies like Angular, React, Spring, and Laravel.
bio.passion: I specialize in creating scalable and practical applications that optimize processes and enhance user experience.
bio.focus: I have led projects that optimize business processes and improve user experience, standing out for my ability to integrate cloud solutions and my commitment to continuous learning.
bio.self-taught: I am passionate about building practical and efficient solutions that combine attractive design with solid architecture.
